thread.title: Adorable baby girl was born so hairy it even showed up on her ULTRASOUND
thread.title_full: Adorable baby girl was born so hairy it even showed up on her ULTRASOUND

author: nkeegan
title: Adorable baby girl was born so hairy it even showed up on her ULTRASOUND
text:
HAIR’S LOOKIN’ AT YOU, KID Adorable baby girl was born so hairy it even showed up on her ULTRASOUND 
Alexis Bartlett, now six-months-old, has so much hair that the ULTRASOUND was able to detect her impressive tresses By NATALIE KEEGAN Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments FOR many babies, it can take months before they are graced with a head of luscious locks – but for one little girl it took just a few weeks in the womb. 
Adorable Alexis Bartlett, now six-months-old, has so much hair that the ULTRASOUND was able to detect her impressive tresses. Caters News Agency 6 Alexis Bartlett from Sydney, Australia has so much hair-her parents were in disbelief at her birth 
Alexis’s Dad, Adrian Bartlett, 32, from Sydney, Australia said: “At first we were both shocked, it wasn’t just her scalp, she had a hairy forehead and hair all over her back-not to mention her hairy butt. 
“The ultrasound even showed up that she was going to be hairy so that was a clear indication she was going to be taking after me in those stakes. 
“I was born with hair and I’ve even put together two photos of us as hairy babies to show people where she’s inherited it from. Caters News Agency Alexis’s hair even made an appearance in the ultrasound – which shows her hairy scalp and forehead Caters News Agency 6 Alexis has boasted a bountiful barnet since she was in the womb 
The irony of Alexis having a magnificent mane could not be greater as her Mum, Nicola Bartlett from London, 32, cuts hair for a living. 
In the Sydney sunshine, Alexis has been able to flaunt her beautiful brown hair when out with her family and she has earned hordes of admirers as a result. Caters News Agency Alexis pictured with her dad Adrian – who says that the tot was so hairy when she was born that she even had a “hairy butt” RELATED STORIES DAD'S DOUBLE BLOW Father of baby twins who was electrocuted in freak accident at work has SECOND arm amputated in fur a shock Police arrest woman and get cutest of surprises when they search her bag - an adorable six-month-old baby koala POSH OR BABY? Brooklyn Beckham shares a cute snap of mum Victoria dressed as Baby Spice Emma Bunton MOTHER NURTURE From polar bears to pandas, cute baby animals love to snuggle up to their parents Hot mama Pregnant Billie Faiers shows off her cute baby bump in sexy black lingerie 
Adrian, who runs a fire extinguisher firm, said: “It’s funny that Nicola, being a hairdresser gave birth to such a hairy baby. 
“Our family love her to bits although her great-grandfather hates all the hair ties and hair clips but he will get over it. 
“Strangers are always stopping us wherever we go to the extent that we couldn’t imagine having a bald baby. Caters News Agency Even though people told Alexis’ parents that her hair would fall out as she got older, it has continued to grow Caters News Agency Adorable Alexis pictured with her mother Nicola, a hairdresser 
“Shopping always takes a little longer and dinners out always get interrupted by everyone sitting nearby. 
“I personally love her hair, I think it adds so much character. 
“As we live in Sydney and it’s currently summer, we are always taking Alexis outside swimming. 
“Everyone said that it would fall out but six months on and it’s only getting longer in fact she might be due a haircut soon, I guess Nicola will have to check her diary for appointments.” 
And Alexis isn’t the only tot to become a hairdresser’s dream. 
Last year we reported on little Junior Cox-Noon – whose bulging barnet led to his mum saying it now takes her two-hours to do the weekly shop because people stop to say hello.
